To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Audition for WSM program Morning Moods, featuring Tommy Sosebee, the Anita Kerr Singers, and Owen Bradley and the Vel-Tones, with announcer Dave Overton. Sponsored by Colgate-Palmolive-Peet products Ajax, Vel, and Veto. See also TR001333.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
